items.title: Gaza's children are paying the price for our failures

items.title: Israel's opposition leader says he supports revoking voting rights of draft dodgers
items.summary: Lapid attacked the Netanyahu government for allowing ultra-Orthodox students to avoid compulsory military service. He said the move would be 'an invitation to be part of the Israeli story'

items.summary: A source told Haaretz that it is unclear how much the group really knows about the location of the bodies, or whether they are conducting random searches. Israel reportedly hampered the searches by refusing to allow teams to use heavy machinery in the Rafah area

items.title: Complaints on Jewish terrorism in the West Bank surge, but police investigations drop
items.summary: Investigations were only opened on a third of Jewish nationalist crime cases in the West Bank. The responsible police unit has not had a commander for almost a year, since the last commander was suspected of deliberately ignoring intelligence on Jewish terrorism

items.title: Watch: Moment nuclear plant towers collapse during demolition
items.summary: Two nuclear cooling towers in the town of Gundremmingen, Germany, collapse into large swirls of thick, white dust during demolition.

items.title: 'I'm not done', Kamala Harris tells the BBC's Laura Kuenssberg
items.summary: The former vice president made her strongest suggestion to date that she will make another presidential bid in 2028 - after losing to Donald Trump last year.

items.title: Satellite images show extent of demolition at the White House
items.summary: New satellite images show the White House East Wing has been completely demolished in order to make way for President Trump's ballroom.
